Module connect4_pattern
Package Game

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
Game.Grid
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGrid, Serializable, IContext
public class Grid extends Object implements IGrid, Serializable

Grid

Represents the object Grid, containing:
- an ArrayList of (Columns)
- a certain width (number of Columns) and height (size of the Columns)
- a TCP Server (ServerTCP)
- different Strategies (Interfaces)
- a turn indicator (red or yellow)
See Also:
